skill_metadata.name: 3x3_product_analysis
skill_metadata.description: Exhaustive product analysis for AI image generation. Extracts visual details, brand DNA, and target persona to feed all downstream image skills.
skill_metadata.author: MTRX Media

overview.purpose: Create a comprehensive product description block that ensures AI image generators reproduce the product with pixel-perfect fidelity. This analysis runs in the background and feeds all image generation skills.
overview.philosophy: The more specific the product description, the more accurate the output. Vague descriptions = hallucinated details. Exhaustive descriptions = faithful reproduction.

product_image.description: Clear product image showing packaging, labels, and details
product_image.ideal: Multiple angles if available, front-facing primary

additional_images.description: Additional product angles, lifestyle shots, etc.

about_page_url.description: Brand about page for deeper voice/values analysis

section_1_visual_analysis.description: Detailed visual breakdown of the physical product

1_1_product_overview.packaging_type: e.g., pouch, bottle, jar, tube, box, bag
1_1_product_overview.material: e.g., foil pouch, glass bottle, plastic jar, cardboard box

1_2_shape_and_form.silhouette: Describe the overall shape - elongated, squat, rectangular, teardrop, etc.
1_2_shape_and_form.dimensions_relative: Tall and slim? Wide and short? Proportions matter.
1_2_shape_and_form.neck_mouth: If applicable - screw top, flip cap, pump, dropper, etc.
1_2_shape_and_form.distinctive_features: Curved hem, embossing, unique structural elements

logo.font_style: Serif, sans-serif, script, bold, thin, etc.
logo.font_details: Rounded terminals, sharp edges, custom typeface, etc.

primary_text.text_exact: Copy EXACTLY what's written, including line breaks
primary_text.color: Exact color with HEX if determinable

secondary_text.text_exact: Any additional text - taglines, descriptors, certifications
secondary_text.placement: Below logo, bottom of package, etc.

1_3_branding_and_graphics.additional_markings: Small text, batch codes, certification badges, etc.

primary_color.name: e.g., Teal, Hot Pink, Matte Black

1_5_textures_and_finishes.primary_finish: Matte, glossy, metallic, holographic, textured, etc.
1_5_textures_and_finishes.secondary_finishes: Different areas may have different finishes
1_5_textures_and_finishes.tactile_elements: Embossing, debossing, raised text, soft-touch coating

1_6_light_interaction.reflective_areas: Where does light catch and create highlights
1_6_light_interaction.transparency: Any see-through elements, windows, clear sections
1_6_light_interaction.refraction: If glass/liquid - how light bends through
1_6_light_interaction.shadows: Where shadows naturally fall on the product

section_2_brand_analysis.description: Brand DNA extracted from website and copy

key_phrases: Exact phrases from their copy that define voice

key_benefits: What it does for the customer

section_3_target_persona.description: Who buys this product - for influencer/lifestyle shots

3_2_psychographics.life_stage: New parent, career-focused, retired, student, etc.
values: What matters to them beyond the product
pain_points: What problems they're trying to solve

3_3_visual_persona.appearance: How would this person look in an ad
3_3_visual_persona.style: Clean girl, streetwear, outdoorsy, corporate, bohemian, etc.
3_3_visual_persona.setting: Where would you find them - gym, office, kitchen, etc.

product_description_block.description: The master block that gets inserted into ALL image prompts
product_description_block.template:
{{brand}} {{product_name}} - {{packaging_type}}. {{silhouette_description}}. {{material_description}}.

BRANDING: {{logo_description}}. Brand name "{{brand_name_text}}" in {{font_style}} {{font_color}}. {{secondary_text_description}}.

COLORS: {{color_breakdown}}.

FINISHES: {{finish_breakdown}}.

KEY VISUAL ELEMENTS: {{distinctive_features}}. {{light_interaction_notes}}.
